alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:44PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron, south central Jefferson Davis and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 930 PM CDT... At 844 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hacketts Corner, or 9 miles southeast of Lake Charles Regional Airport. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Iowa, Grand Lake, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Hayes, Hacketts Corner, Heberts Marina, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown, Holmwood, Lacassine and Bell City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 34 and 53. Interstate 210 between mile markers 9 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
